 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חוֺב‎</span> **noun [masculine]** ==debt== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חוֺבָא‎</span>); — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָשִׁיב‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֲבֹלָתוֺ ח‎</span> [[Ezek.18.7|Ezek 18:7]] ***his pledge as to indebtedness he restores***, see [[BDB#Hi|Hi]]-[[BDB#Sm|Sm]] [[BDB#Ew|Ew]]<sup>§ 291 b</sup> [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:132»§ 132</sup> R 5, b [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>Lgb. i. 497 f.</sup> and compare [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]<sup>§ 193</sup> (but construction hard: [[BDB#Co|Co]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוֺב‎</span>; dittograph from<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חבל‎</span> [[BDB#Bev|Bev]]<sup>[[Dan.1|Dan 1]]. 10</sup>, compare v[[Ezek.18.12|Ezek 18:12]] v: 16).
